SELECT u.USER_NO, u.USER_ID, b.*, c.CL_NO, c.CL_TITLE, c.CL_THUMBNAILPATH, u2.USER_NO CL_USER_NO, u2.USER_ID CL_USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME CL_USER_NAME FROM USERINFO u JOIN bookmark b on u.user_no = b.user_no JOIN CLASS c on b.cl_no = c.cl_no JOIN USERINFO u2 on c.user_no = u2.user_no WHERE c.cl_grant = 'A' AND u.user_no = ?
